description: This file defines an Angular standalone component 'ForgotPasswordComponent' which provides a UI for users to input their email address to initiate a password reset process. It interacts with an authentication service to send password reset requests and manages user feedback messages based on the response.

classes.name: ForgotPasswordComponent
classes.description: Angular component enabling users to request a password reset by entering their email address, handling form validation, user feedback, and interaction with authentication services.

methods.name: ngAfterViewInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that sets focus to the heading element when the view initializes, if running in a browser context.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission for the forgot password form, invokes the auth service, manages loading state, and updates success or error messages based on the response.
